ShipLogDictionary.Symbols are scattered throughout the mes: Symbols are scattered throughout the message written on the crystalline cairns.
ShipLogDictionary.An anomaly resting far below the plane o: An anomaly resting far below the plane of the solar system. A Nomai probe is found nearby.

DialogueDictionary.The Strangers were archivists, preservin: The inhabitants of the Stranger were archivists, preserving information at any cost. But their fear of the Eye led them to hide from the world inside a simulation of their own creation. Until one of them released the signal for the Nomai to find, and was imprisoned for their actions.
DialogueDictionary.Firing signal received, retrieving store: Firing signal received, retrieving stored coordinates. Launching secondary probe. Secondary probe arrived at destination. Beginning primary probe launch sequence.
DialogueDictionary.We used the <![CDATA[<Color=orange>]]>As: This probe is our final hope. We used the <![CDATA[<Color=orange>]]>Astral Codec<![CDATA[</Color>]]> to transmit every story, every piece of information we could record before the end. If you're reading this, our message must have made it through the vortex intact.
